title: Top Down Social Justice With Alisia Ratliff
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Celebrating International Women's Day with Alisia Ratliff, Scientist and CEO of Victus Capital Ventures. A frank conversation about the frustrations of being the only woman in the board room; the push to keep evolving and starting Victus with her husband Chris. Leading with science and data. Building awareness and strategic change. Loving extraction and new cannabinoids coming online. The stress of having IPs without capital. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
